value:
Begone with you, now! Leave this
to me.

You want my thoughts on Fódlan?
It is a weeping land, bathed in blood,
and in desperate need of a savior.

You are quite the strange one. I do
wonder what you are doing here...

If you are idle, and it is entertainment
that you seek, come and spend some
time with me.

What's wrong, you ask? I seem
different to you somehow? Ask me
later... I am sleepy, at the moment.

I have arrived at last. You may now
rejoice, $Nu.
Not bad, not bad!
I can do more than this!

It would seem I have reached the
limit of this body...
I will make my mark.

I am...Byleth. Yes, Byleth. A simple
mercenary, and nothing more.

Nothing but endless battle, day in
and day out. How droll!$k$pWell. I suppose even a progenitor
god must endure an unpleasant turn
of events now and again.$k$pUgh—this vessel, it simply will not
behave! Stop it! What do you think
you're doing?!$k$pApologies—I know I'm not myself.
And I'm sure you already know
what's come over this body.$k$pIt can't be helped, but...no use
dwelling on it. As the Ashen Demon,
I will bring my blade to bear for you.
You dare touch me?
Your fate is dust!
You! Kneel.
Pay with your life!
Again...you resist me?
Become my vessel? Ha! A foolish hope.
Such vexing arrogance for one so small.
A vessel like this one constrains me so. Its poor quality stifles my power.
It yet remains behind a veil to me... Tell me, why am I here?
Revenge fulfills your own desires. Boast not of taking it for someone else's sake.
And now, behold all that I have discovered at the edge of time.
*laugh* It would seem you begin to understand.
Well.
I shall go.
Have you made ready?
